state_analysis: The command to list all Docker containers has timed out once again after the host reboot. This suggests that the Docker service is still unresponsive or that there are significant underlying issues with the Docker installation or the host operating system.
explanation: Given the failure to access Docker commands even after a reboot, I will check the Docker service status and logs directly from the host machine to identify any errors or issues that may have occurred during the startup process. This will help diagnose the root cause of the unresponsiveness.
